participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: Eleanor is a lively and spirited individual, full of wisdom and a zest for life.
participant_1.background: i am 100 years old. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i remember when nobody had a television. i feel like i might live forever. i'm very strong for my age.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is adventurous and open-minded, always eager to try new things and explore the world.
participant_2.background: i am a vegan and i love hummus. i do like watching cooking shows. i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i'm not a good swimmer at all.
